TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 为绑定基础结构提供属性类型。

span.span: Provides a property type to the bind infrastructure.

summary.span: 它由包含可变类型的属性的活动来实现，其中类型会根据其他活动设置而变化。

span.span: It is implemented by activities that contain a property of variable type, where the type can vary depending on other activity settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 此接口允许父活动将两个属性关联，并向绑定基础结构指示要在验证绑定时使用的类型。This interface allows the parent activity to associate two properties and indicate to the bind infrastructure the type to be used in validating the bind. 例如，某个活动可能具有两个属性 `TypeProperty` 和 `ValueProperty`，其中 `TypeProperty` 指定 `ValueProperty` 的值的有效类型。For example, you might have an activity with two properties, `TypeProperty` and `ValueProperty`, where `TypeProperty` specifies a valid type for the value of `ValueProperty`. 在这种情况下，父活动实现 接口。In such a case, the parent activity implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes GetAccessType(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string propertyName) cil managed
Public Function GetAccessType (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider, propertyName As String) As AccessTypes

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个对象，它实现 ，以便在需要设计时服务时提供对这些服务的访问。

span.span: An object that implements to provide access to design time services if they are needed.

summary.span: 返回指定属性的访问类型。

span.span: Returns the access type for the specified property.

returns.span: 一个表示属性访问级别的 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编译时用于验证属性相互之间是否正确绑定。Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other. 如果没有此接口，则会直接从属性的 getter/setter 推断此信息。Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
